content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position (z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b1) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position z1

### Copper plate mine at position (w)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position w1) and a furnace at position (v1)
- Burner mining drill (position w2) and a furnace at position (v2)
- Burner mining drill (position w3) and a furnace at position (v3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure that you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which cannot be crafted if you do not have a furnace or crafting machine available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
